folder: Rivington Street & Allen Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
69-73 Rivington Street, at the S. E. corner of Allen Street. The view shows the Rivington Street station of the Second Ave., Elevated Lines.

About 1925.

New York World.

text:

June 21, 1927.

P. L. Sperr.

folder: Rivington Street & Allen Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
(1) 80-84 Rivington Street, north side, east from Allen to Orchard Streets, showing the overflow of the Orchard Street pushcart market.
January 17, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same, showing a view farther east. Intersection shown is Orchard Street.
April 28, 1934.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) 84 Rivington Street, at the N.W. corner of Orchard Street, showing a Jewish bakery.
April 28, 1934.

P. L. Sperr.

folder: Rivington Street #77 - Allen Street, Manhattan, NY
title: Rivington Street #77 - Allen Street

folder: Allen Street & Rivington Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
Allen Street, at Rivington Street and southward, as photo- from the downtown "EL" platform. Opposite same, and depicted by the photographed is the uptown station.

May 7, 1940
No's. 1-2

P. L. Sperr
